original_title: 超英雄祭 KAMEN RIDER × SUPER SENTAI LIVE & SHOW 2016
overview: A special event that delivers talks by the casts of "Kamen Rider Ghost" and "Shuriken Sentai Ninninger", and luxurious music live by artists who excite Kamen Rider & Super Sentai series. At Music Live, we have created a special live performance by the gorgeous guest artists that is unique to the Super Hero Festival! We will deliver live performances that have achieved even greater collaboration and revolution!
title: Super Hero Festival: Kamen Rider x Super Sentai Live & Show 2016
